primary_concerns: Navigation max-width constraint preventing edge-to-edge layout
Selected navigation item has poor visibility - appears black/nearly invisible
Inconsistent container widths across pages creating jarring user experience
Accessibility issues with color contrast and touch targets
Responsive design breakpoint inconsistencies across components

critical_issues.title: Navigation max-width constraint prevents full-width layout
critical_issues.description: Navigation uses max-w-container (1400px) which prevents edge-to-edge layout on large screens
critical_issues.user_impact: Navigation appears boxed-in with white space on sides on large displays
critical_issues.alternative_fix: Create separate layout for nav without max-width but keep container for inner content

critical_issues.title: Selected navigation item nearly invisible - poor active state
critical_issues.description: Active navigation item uses text-accent which user reports appears black/nearly invisible. Needs stronger visual indicator like underline or background
critical_issues.user_impact: Users cannot tell which page they are on, poor navigation feedback
critical_issues.recommended_fix: currentPath === item.path ? 'text-accent font-bold border-b-2 border-accent pb-1' : textColorClass
critical_issues.visual_enhancement: Add underline border to clearly indicate active page

critical_issues.title: Floating booking widget blocks content on mobile
critical_issues.description: Fixed bottom booking button always visible, blocks last section content without bottom padding compensation
critical_issues.user_impact: Users cannot see or interact with bottom page content on mobile devices
critical_issues.recommended_fix: Add pb-20 or pb-24 to all page layouts when booking widget is present, or make widget dismissible
critical_issues.alternative_fix: Use IntersectionObserver to hide widget when footer is visible

critical_issues.title: Touch targets too small on mobile - below 44x44px minimum
critical_issues.description: Many buttons and links don't meet iOS/Android minimum touch target size of 44x44px
critical_issues.user_impact: Users struggle to tap buttons accurately on mobile, leading to frustration
critical_issues.current_issue: Buttons use py-2 px-4 which creates ~32px touch targets
critical_issues.recommended_fix: Ensure all interactive elements have min-h-[44px] and adequate padding

critical_issues.title: Missing focus states for keyboard navigation
critical_issues.description: Many interactive elements lack visible focus indicators for keyboard users
critical_issues.user_impact: Keyboard users cannot navigate site effectively, fails WCAG requirements
critical_issues.current_issue: No focus:ring or focus:outline styles on most buttons/links
critical_issues.recommended_fix: Add focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent focus:ring-offset-2 focus:outline-none to all interactive elements

high_priority_issues.title: Inconsistent container widths across pages
high_priority_issues.description: Pages use different max-width values (max-w-4xl, max-w-7xl, max-w-container) without consistent pattern
high_priority_issues.user_impact: Content jumps width as users navigate between pages, feels unprofessional
high_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Establish consistent width system: Hero sections = full width, Content sections = max-w-7xl, Text sections = max-w-4xl

high_priority_issues.title: Category filter buttons lack visual prominence
high_priority_issues.description: Room category filters only show bottom border when active, easy to miss
high_priority_issues.user_impact: Users don't notice filtering functionality, may think site lacks filtering
high_priority_issues.current_code: Active state only adds border-b-2 border-accent
high_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Add background color and more prominent styling: 'bg-accent text-white px-6 py-3 rounded-lg' for active state

high_priority_issues.title: Similar rooms section uses img tag instead of Next Image
high_priority_issues.description: Room detail page similar rooms use standard img tag, losing optimization benefits
high_priority_issues.user_impact: Slower page load, poor image optimization, worse Core Web Vitals
high_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Replace with Next.js Image component: <Image src={similarRoom.image} alt={similarRoom.name} fill className="object-cover" />

high_priority_issues.title: Image carousel navigation hidden on touch devices
high_priority_issues.description: Carousel arrows use opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100, invisible on touch screens
high_priority_issues.user_impact: Mobile users cannot navigate image galleries easily
high_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Make arrows always visible on mobile: 'opacity-100 md:opacity-0 md:group-hover:opacity-100'

high_priority_issues.title: Color contrast issues - gray text may fail WCAG AA
high_priority_issues.description: text-gray-500 and text-gray-600 on white may not meet 4.5:1 contrast ratio
high_priority_issues.user_impact: Users with vision impairments cannot read body text easily
high_priority_issues.current_issue: Uses text-gray-500 and text-gray-600 for body text
high_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Use text-gray-700 minimum for body text, test all colors with contrast checker

high_priority_issues.title: Footer max-width prevents edge-to-edge layout
high_priority_issues.description: Footer uses max-w-container limiting width to 1400px
high_priority_issues.user_impact: Footer doesn't extend to screen edges on large displays, looks incomplete
high_priority_issues.current_code: <div className="max-w-container mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-16">
high_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Remove max-width or apply max-width only to inner content grid, let footer background extend full width

high_priority_issues.title: Footer grid layout breaks awkwardly on tablets
high_priority_issues.description: Footer grid jumps from 1 column to 4 columns, no tablet breakpoint
high_priority_issues.user_impact: Awkward layout on iPad and tablet devices, columns too narrow

high_priority_issues.title: Loading states are minimal - just text
high_priority_issues.description: Room list loading state shows plain text instead of skeleton or spinner
high_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Add skeleton cards or spinner component for better loading UX

high_priority_issues.title: Price badge visibility issues on dark images
high_priority_issues.description: Room card price badges use bg-black/50 which may be illegible on dark room images
high_priority_issues.user_impact: Users cannot see prices on some room cards
high_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Increase backdrop opacity to bg-black/70 or add white border for better contrast

high_priority_issues.title: Inconsistent heading sizes across pages
high_priority_issues.description: H1 sizes vary without clear hierarchy: some 3xl, some 4xl, some 5xl
high_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Standardize page titles to text-4xl md:text-5xl, hero titles to text-5xl md:text-7xl

high_priority_issues.title: Room detail page has duplicate price displays
high_priority_issues.description: Price shown both in top-right badge AND booking card - redundant
high_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Remove top-right price badge, keep only in booking card where action happens

high_priority_issues.title: Inconsistent breakpoint progressions across components
high_priority_issues.description: Some components go 1→4 cols, others 2→4, no standard tablet experience
high_priority_issues.user_impact: Inconsistent tablet layouts, some pages look good, others broken
high_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Establish standard: Mobile=1, Tablet=2, Desktop=3-4 cols

high_priority_issues.title: Sticky booking card may overlap footer
high_priority_issues.description: Room detail sticky booking card uses sticky top-24 without bottom constraint
high_priority_issues.user_impact: Booking card overlaps footer on short screens
high_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Add max-height and scroll container or use intersection observer to unstick at footer

high_priority_issues.title: Button styling inconsistency across pages
high_priority_issues.description: Primary buttons use different classes: some use bg-[#ec681c], others use bg-accent
high_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Always use theme colors: bg-accent hover:bg-accent-hover, never hardcode colors

high_priority_issues.title: Horizontal scrolling category filters janky on mobile
high_priority_issues.description: Room category filter uses overflow-x-auto without snap points or smooth scrolling
high_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Add snap-x snap-mandatory scrollbar-hide for better mobile UX

medium_priority_issues.title: Section padding inconsistency across pages
medium_priority_issues.description: Sections use varying padding (py-12, py-16, py-20) without clear hierarchy
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Standardize: Small sections=py-12, Standard=py-16, Hero=py-20/py-24

medium_priority_issues.title: Grid gap values vary across components
medium_priority_issues.description: Different components use gap-4, gap-6, gap-8, gap-12 without pattern
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Standardize to gap-6 for card grids, gap-8 for section spacing

medium_priority_issues.title: Room facilities list is too sparse
medium_priority_issues.description: Room detail only shows 'Towels' and 'Wifi Access' - looks under-equipped
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Add comprehensive amenities list or fetch from CMS

medium_priority_issues.title: Hero component uses inline styles instead of Tailwind
medium_priority_issues.description: Video filter and transforms use inline styles, hard to maintain
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Convert to Tailwind utility classes or extract to component variants

medium_priority_issues.title: Image carousel lacks keyboard navigation
medium_priority_issues.description: No arrow key support for navigating image galleries
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Add keyboard event listeners for left/right arrow keys

medium_priority_issues.title: Image carousel lacks swipe gesture support
medium_priority_issues.description: Touch users cannot swipe to navigate galleries
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Implement touch event handlers or use library like swiper.js

medium_priority_issues.title: Floating booking widget has no close button
medium_priority_issues.description: Modal only closes by clicking backdrop, not obvious to users
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Add visible X button in modal header

medium_priority_issues.title: Floating booking widget uses hardcoded orange color
medium_priority_issues.description: Uses bg-orange-500 instead of theme's bg-accent
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Replace all instances of bg-orange-500 with bg-accent

medium_priority_issues.title: Homepage sections use inconsistent max-widths
medium_priority_issues.description: Some sections max-w-4xl, others max-w-7xl within same page
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Apply consistent pattern: Hero=full, Features=max-w-7xl, Quotes=max-w-4xl

medium_priority_issues.title: Video hero padding insufficient on smallest screens
medium_priority_issues.description: Only px-4 padding may cause text to touch edges on very small devices
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Increase to px-6 for better breathing room

medium_priority_issues.title: Room showcase cards have inconsistent spacing
medium_priority_issues.description: Card grid gap-8 but internal card spacing varies
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Standardize internal card padding to p-6

medium_priority_issues.title: Rooms page title lacks visual hierarchy
medium_priority_issues.description: Page title section very minimal, just h1 with border
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Add subtitle, breadcrumb, or description for context

medium_priority_issues.title: Room detail page uses hardcoded nav height
medium_priority_issues.description: Uses h-20 spacer but nav height changes on scroll
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Use pt-20 on main container instead of separate spacer div

medium_priority_issues.title: Surf weeks page uses emojis that may render inconsistently
medium_priority_issues.description: Emojis in text may look different across devices/browsers
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Replace emojis with icon components from Lucide

medium_priority_issues.title: Surf weeks hero quote section lacks visual breaks
medium_priority_issues.description: Long text block without breaks is hard to read
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Split into paragraphs with emphasis on key phrases

medium_priority_issues.title: Gallery grid missing tablet breakpoint
medium_priority_issues.description: Jumps from 2 cols to 4 cols, no 3-column tablet state
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4

medium_priority_issues.title: Surf weeks dates section poor visual hierarchy
medium_priority_issues.description: Critical booking dates shown as plain list without prominence
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Add calendar icons, highlight available dates, show booking status

medium_priority_issues.title: FAQ accordion needs better hover/active states
medium_priority_issues.description: Accordion items need clearer interaction affordance
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Add hover background color and arrow animation

medium_priority_issues.title: The Spot page minimal content structure
medium_priority_issues.description: Single text paragraph without visual interest or formatting
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Add pull quotes, timeline, images, or visual breaks

medium_priority_issues.title: Image carousels without descriptive context
medium_priority_issues.description: Three carousels in sequence without captions or descriptions
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Add captions or section titles for each carousel

medium_priority_issues.title: The Spot page section spacing inconsistent
medium_priority_issues.description: Sections use py-16, py-12 without clear pattern
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Standardize to py-16 for all sections

medium_priority_issues.title: Booking page layout inconsistent with other pages
medium_priority_issues.description: Uses bg-gray-50 py-12 while others have consistent header structure
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Add consistent page header section like other pages

medium_priority_issues.title: Booking page uses emojis instead of icons
medium_priority_issues.description: Uses phone and email emojis instead of Lucide icons
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Replace with <Phone /> and <Mail /> from lucide-react

medium_priority_issues.title: Contact links use wrong color class
medium_priority_issues.description: Uses text-orange-500 instead of theme's text-accent
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Replace text-orange-500 with text-accent

medium_priority_issues.title: Footer map embed too short
medium_priority_issues.description: Map has h-48 which may cut off map controls
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Increase to h-64 or h-72 for better visibility

medium_priority_issues.title: Long paragraphs lack explicit line-height
medium_priority_issues.description: Body text in surf-weeks and the-spot may be hard to read
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Add leading-relaxed or leading-loose to body text

medium_priority_issues.title: Uppercase text overused
medium_priority_issues.description: Too much uppercase reduces readability
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Reserve uppercase for small UI elements only, not long text

medium_priority_issues.title: Navigation mobile menu background inconsistent
medium_priority_issues.description: Mobile menu bg-black/90, desktop homepage nav bg-black/20
medium_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Use consistent theming or explicitly different styling

low_priority_issues.title: Rooms page uses client-side rendering
low_priority_issues.description: Entire rooms page is 'use client', loses SEO benefits
low_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Convert to Server Component, use Server Actions for filtering

low_priority_issues.title: Navigation fetches data client-side
low_priority_issues.description: Nav items fetched on every page load client-side
low_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Pass navigation items from layout as server data

low_priority_issues.title: Missing priority loading on hero images
low_priority_issues.description: Above-fold images not marked with priority prop
low_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Add priority prop to hero and first 3 room cards

low_priority_issues.title: Video autoplay without preload strategy
low_priority_issues.description: Homepage video has no poster or preload optimization

low_priority_issues.title: Framer Motion animation may be janky on low-end devices
low_priority_issues.description: Card grid animates each card individually with delay
low_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Use CSS animations or reduce complexity

low_priority_issues.title: Image hover scale too aggressive
low_priority_issues.description: scale-105 and scale-110 can feel jarring

low_priority_issues.title: Image aspect ratios inconsistent
low_priority_issues.description: Room images use different aspect ratios (h-64 vs aspect-video)

low_priority_issues.title: Booking page is placeholder
low_priority_issues.description: Entire page says 'Coming Soon', no actual functionality
low_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Integrate booking system or remove page from nav

low_priority_issues.title: Room details are hardcoded
low_priority_issues.description: Room data hardcoded in component, not from CMS

low_priority_issues.title: Some alt text is generic
low_priority_issues.description: Images use generic alt text like 'Room image'
low_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Add descriptive alt text for each image

low_priority_issues.title: Button hover scale causes layout shift
low_priority_issues.description: hover:scale-105 on buttons causes CLS issues
low_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Use color/shadow changes instead of scale

low_priority_issues.title: Orange accent color may not meet contrast for small text
low_priority_issues.description: Accent color #ec681c on white may fail AA for small text
low_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Test and potentially darken accent for text usage

low_priority_issues.title: White text on video overlays may not be readable
low_priority_issues.description: Video backgrounds vary, white text needs darker overlay
low_priority_issues.recommended_fix: Increase overlay to bg-black/40 or add text-shadow

low_priority_issues.title: CTA buttons use inline styles
low_priority_issues.description: Hero CTA buttons have extensive inline styles

phase_1_critical.title: Critical Fixes - Week 1
phase_1_critical.rationale: These issues break core UX and accessibility, must be fixed immediately
success_criteria: Navigation extends edge-to-edge on all screen sizes
Active nav items clearly visible with underline
All interactive elements have visible focus states
Floating widget doesn't block content on mobile

phase_2_high_priority.title: High Priority Improvements - Week 2
phase_2_high_priority.rationale: These issues significantly impact user experience and professional appearance
success_criteria: Consistent container widths across all pages
All images use Next.js Image component

phase_3_medium_priority.title: Polish and Consistency - Week 3-4
phase_3_medium_priority.rationale: These issues improve consistency and professional polish

phase_4_optimization.title: Performance and Enhancement - Ongoing
phase_4_optimization.rationale: These are nice-to-have improvements for long-term maintenance

interactive.button_primary: bg-accent hover:bg-accent-hover text-white px-6 py-3 rounded-lg font-medium transition-colors
interactive.button_secondary: bg-white hover:bg-gray-50 text-accent border-2 border-accent px-6 py-3 rounded-lg font-medium transition-colors
